additionalProperties.description: List of annotations that must be matched at the table level in order to apply the measure template. See Annotations for standard annotations used.

TargetTable.description: List of annotations that must be matched at the table level in order to apply the measure template. See Annotations for standard annotations used.

additionalProperties.description: List of annotations applied to the measures generated by the template. By looking at these annotations it is possible to identify and modify/remove the measures created by a measure template.

TemplateAnnotations.description: List of annotations applied to the measures generated by the template. By looking at these annotations it is possible to identify and modify/remove the measures created by a measure template.

Name.description: Name of the measure template. if IsSingleInstance is false, this is the name applied as a prefix or suffix to the existing measure name when the new measure is created from the template.

IsHidden.description: true if the measure is hidden.

IsSingleInstance.description: true if the measure must be created in a single instance and not for every measure.

additionalProperties.description: List of annotations applied to the measure.

Annotations.description: List of annotations applied to the measure.

Comment.description: Single line comment. If defined, Comment has precedence over MultiLineComment.

items.description: Array of strings that define a DAX expression in a multiple lines. If Comment is defined, then MultiLineComment is ignored.

MultiLineComment.description: Array of strings that define a DAX expression in a multiple lines. If Comment is defined, then MultiLineComment is ignored.

Expression.description: DAX expression defined in a single line. If defined, Expression has precedence over MultiLineExpression.

items.description: Array of strings that define a comment in multiple lines. If Expression is defined, then MultiLineExpression is ignored.

MultiLineExpression.description: Array of strings that define a comment in multiple lines. If Expression is defined, then MultiLineExpression is ignored.

items.description: List of Measure Template objects, one for each template item.

MeasureTemplates.description: List of Measure Template objects, one for each template item.
